title: The Three Stooges - Treasure Hunt Hijinks.rar
description:
Join Larry, Moe, and Curly, those comedy icons, as they search for a secret treasure. Stay one step ahead of their dastardly landlord, Mr. G. Reedy while hunting for clues in a variety of levels. Relive the hilarious antics of the The Three Stooges, inspired by classic in-game shorts and movies. Can you brave the follies of this famous TV trio? Scour scenes in this Hidden Object saga, and hang with your best buds, The Three Stooges.

    * Hidden Object game, TV classic
    * In-game shorts and movies
    * Relive Three Stooges blunders!
